text: Andrej Andreevich Zolotov (born 13 December 1937) is a Russian screenwriter and music and art critic. He has written over 30 documentaries about Russian musicians, composers and conductors. He is the vice president of the Russian Academy of Arts.Золотов-старший Андрей Андреевич: http://www.kino- teatr.ru/kino/screenwriter/sov/373093/bio/http://www.worldcat.org/identities/lccn-n84-100153 list of his works from WorldCat He was born in Moscow. He wrote the scripts for Komsomolskaya Pravda and the TV series Vremya. He was Assistant Minister of Culture between 1990 and 1992.
